00066 #ifndef _LAZY_UTIL_H_
00067 #define _LAZY_UTIL_H_
00068 
00069 //#define WSCALE 10
00070 #define WEIGHT_EPSILON .0001
00071 
00072 class LazyUtil
00073 {
00074 
00075  public:
00076 
00077   static int mySign(int x)
00078   {
00079     return (x>0)?1:0; 
00080   }
00081 
00082   static void setAllActive(Domain * const & domain)
00083   {
00084     Array<Predicate*> gpreds;
00085     Predicate *gpred;
00086 
00087     for (int predno = 0; predno < domain->getNumPredicates(); predno++)
00088     {
00089           gpreds.clear();
00090           PredicateTemplate *ptemplate = (PredicateTemplate *)domain->getPredicateTemplate(predno);     
00091           if(ptemplate->isEqualPredWithType())
00092             continue;
00093           Predicate::createAllGroundings(predno, domain, gpreds);
00094                 
00095           for (int i = 0; i < gpreds.size(); i++) 
00096       {
00097             gpred = gpreds[i];
00098             bool evidence = domain->getDB()->getEvidenceStatus(gpred);
00099             if(!evidence) 
00100               domain->getDB()->setActiveStatus(gpred,true);
00101             delete gpred;
00102           }
00103     }
00104   }
00105 
00106 };
00107 
00108 #endif
